Title: Unto the Dusk
Writer: Sajin Baabu (story), Sajin Baabu, Jose John, Jose John (story)
Actors: Prakruthi Dutta Mukherji, Shilpa Kavalam, Sanal Aman, Joseph Mapilasery
Plot: Compulsion from parents and relatives cause a youth to reach the seminary. Though pursuing the path of St. Francis of Assissi, the challenges and conflicts in life and seminary transforms ...
